description:
An update for "Tomodachi Life™" is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Tomodachi Life™” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 2.0 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience. - Dutch language is now available.

• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
name: Tomodachi Life™: Update
